title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: If I no correct , senior men go correct me. I know the joy wey dey to dey post for where you belong as e dey make you feel comfortable but e good make we make something's clear for newbie for the forum. This matter na something wey Dem don discus before but base on say the mistake they come up again, I believe say make we still touch the matter.Naija board na one better board and the activities for the board this days dey make belle sweet person.  Senior men Dem don try their best to keep the board clean from every form of spam but the joy and happiness of newbie always dey blindfold Dem make them forget the rule. If u post topic and you come post another topic/thread wey dey related, that one na spam, Dem fit they desame place .If your reply dey too short, Dem no dey neccessary, this place no he social media for all those kind chat, that one self is considered spam.If you dey quote unnecessarily or your quote too dey long. When your quote they carry multiple quote , that one self dey more like sparm cause e dey always de hard to read am by others. If you dey respond to topic wey you know understand con dey talk out of point , even that one na spam.If others dey wey I no mention, Dem senior men go yarn them with us. If Dem correct you, abeg no see am as attack, na the right board you dey sooo. I no say everyboard like grow ihn account but make respect the rules. For this local board, I fit boastfully tell una say, people for here get love inside them, and for here, your account fit get the merit wey you wan hustle for but apply sense make we dey enjoy the board as usual

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Insightful thought, but very sorry if i say that this is not needed, i mean this thread, there are no specified rules for the local board that is not already specified in the general forum rules and regulation, so any user breaking the rules in the local board is as well breaking the rules of the forum in general, spam is spam, no matter where it is posted, be it in the local board or global board.And let me also say that we dont correct a spam by spam, and what to i mean by this?..Quote from: Forever101 on October 05, 2023, 12:34:36 PMIf u post topic and you come post another topic/thread wey dey related, that one na spam, Dem fit they desame place .The user who created the thread, which brought about the idea of this, has already been told on the thread that what he or she did or is doing is completely wrong, and that he or she should lock the thread, there is no need creating another thread based on that same issue.QuoteIf your reply dey too short, Dem no dey neccessary, this place no he social media for all those kind chat, that one self is considered spam.This I disagree with, you don't have to type the page page of a book before you be considers as a quality poster, for all care, there are some one line replies that are so accurate and at the same time, so straight to the point.And do i need to tell you that many who type long walls of texts are mostly doing so to make sure their post or comment meet the requirement of what ever company they are promoting through signature ad campaign.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on October 05, 2023, 12:34:36 PM~I agree with you,but not all your points listed are considered spamming. I want to add some more advice1. Newbies should always try to check if a similar topic already exists before creating a new one. Sometimes, you'll notice repeated topics on the board which to me is spamming and it's better to avoid that. You can easily scroll through older posts to check. This is why we need a moderator for our local board. I hope they give us one soon.2. While we've talked about this before, it's essential to create meaningful topics that are worth discussing. Just because the board doesn't frown that much to some unessesary thread doesn't mean you should post low-quality content. Some threads make no sense at all. Remember, this is a Bitcoin forum, not a place for daily updates on our personal lives. Let's engage in high-quality discussions.3. You should also remember that we're all one family here, and there's no need to get upset over anything or someone's reply. If someone's reply seems offensive, it's better to ignore it and not start unnecessary fights. We all want what's best for ourselves. Even if someone has a higher forum rank, we're all equal here, so don't feel unfairly treated if someone acts a bit out of line.

comments.body: I am even of the opinion of how people post and reply quotes, you know I have seen a lot of replies especially the newbies I’m not saying I’m not a newbie though, but the way people quotes I disturbing. Kindly take out D information that you don’t need and then leave the ones you want to reply, and then quote it and submit but when I see one line post that quote an entire page looks disturbing in the eye.I find challenging in this loacl is that there is no direction or probably is because we don’t have boards for appropriate discussion. I think it will be more better if that is discuss by the elders in this local board. Not as if I am good or too good in crypto related discussion, but it will be better if we regulate the kind of topics that are been dump in this our local becausesome is not encouraging. I mean somebody bring discussion how to make our life better, I just feel like the topic is kind of off-topic, there are many more of these  topics and threads in our local community that are supposed to be deleted as soon as they even posted, but I would like the elders to speak on this and not to be reporting some threads because the moderators that we have in this forum don’t understand pigin.
